title: Enakku Piditha Padal Song Lyrics Julie Ganapathy
stanzas:
Enakku Piditha Padal Song Lyrics Julie Ganapathy
#Ilaiyaraja #ShreyaGhosal

[ Enaku piditha paadal
adhu unakkum pudikkume
un manadhu pogum
vazhiyai endhan manadhu
ariyume.

ennai piditha nilavu
adhu unnai pidikkume
kadhal noaikku marandhu
thandhu noaiyai koottume.

udhirvadhu pookkalaa
manadhu valartha solaiye
kadhal pookkal udhirumaa] (2)

mella nerungidum podhu
nee dhoora pogiraai
vittu vilagidum podhu
nee nerungi varugiraai

vaanathil parakkiren
mogathil midhakkiren
kadhalaal naanum orr
kaathaadi aagiren.

velli kambigalai pole
oru thooral podutho..
vinnum mannil vandhu sera
adhu paalam podutho..

neerthuli theendinaal
nee thodum niyaabagam
nee thotta idamellaam
veenaiyin thaen swaram.

aayinum aruviyaai
anbile nenaikkiraai
megam pola enakkulle
mogam valarthu kalaigiraai

Enaku piditha paadal
adhu unakkum pudikkume
un manadhu pogum
vazhiyai endhan manadhu
ariyume.

ennai piditha nilavu
adhu unnai pidikkume
kadhal noaikku marandhu
thandhu noaiyai koottume.

udhirvadhu pookkalaa
manadhu valartha solaiye
kadhal pookkal udhirumaa
